friends midler han and keaton come
together for her funeral they realize
how similar all of their divorce stories
are and they set out to get back at
their exes for taking them for granted
the film was considered a surprise box

and bringing its own little ray of
something to this list of breakup movies
is 2004's eternal sunshine of the
spotless mind kate winslet stars in this
one as clementine who after a painful
breakup undergoes a procedure to erase
memories of her former boyfriend jim
carrey joel from her mind i mean if only
it were that easy right and when he

she's taking to forget their

mixes some sci-fi elements with

nature of memory love and loss kaufman
took home the oscar for best original

swank for a million dollar baby i mean
